meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in proteins.
meanings.sent1: Isoleucines are important for building proteins in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Proteins contain various amino acids, including isoleucines.
meanings.sent3: The isoleucines in the protein party were the life of the amino acid dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like the isoleucines in a protein chain, holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The isoleucines acted as the construction workers, building the protein skyscraper.

meanings.sent1: She added isoleucines to the shopping list for the lab.
meanings.sent2: The researchers needed more isoleucines for their experiment.
meanings.sent3: The bag of isoleucines accidentally spilled all over the lab, creating chaos.
meanings.sent4: The isoleucines lined up neatly in rows, ready for use in the study.
meanings.sent5: Each of the isoleucines had a specific role to play in the research project.
